entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
